post.body:
Hello all. I 've started writing a new blogging platform for ZeroNet.

http://127.0.0.1:43110/1JrT4VnMgpm6GgHV6R9yvgp5WkY8yTnRr7

Here you can find version 0.2, which comes with an inner updater, so that all future versions can be installed through the admin panel.

Would like some feedback.

ZeroPress version 0.3

http://127.0.0.1:43110/1JrT4VnMgpm6GgHV6R9yvgp5WkY8yTnRr7/

This version comes with the ability to add images inside your posts. It is still in a primitive stage, so after insertion you will have to drag and drop it at the point of your document you want it to exist. The feature where it will be placed right where you type, will be implemented in a later version. Not the next one.


It also comes with some minor upgrades to the code which from now on will also be available on github. ZeroNet GitCenter will be next.

https://github.com/cleancodetech/ZeroPress

Hello all.

I made some further modifications to a blogging platform I try to write for ZeroNet on my free time:

Added an assets panel in the admin section, where users can manage their uploaded images. Using the interface, one can also find unused images, meaning images that are not used in some way either on posts or on the site in general and they can delete them.
Also the Social Menus were moved to their own panel and reddit is also made available.
Some changes to the theme as well, trying to tackle the problem where an admin would create a new post but it would not appear on the front side.
Also added a viewport entry on the content.json file. Props to styromaniac@kxoid.bit

You can find it here: http://127.0.0.1:43110/1JrT4VnMgpm6GgHV6R9yvgp5WkY8yTnRr7

Any feedback would be appreciated. Thank you for your time :)
